Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
Client.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientUI
public class ClientController extends Object implements ClientUI
JavaFX controller for the Bistro client application.

Manages the main UI navigation (dashboard/profile/history), reservation creation and cancellation, and communication with the server using BistroClient.

Implements ClientUI to receive connection events and server messages.
